Articles.Content:
3rd edit: no, again, 1.1 is in a horrible condition. I'll try again in 2 3 months. After 30 hours of unsuccessful trying to start with just ONE mod i give up.

(On Lubuntu 15.10 ist will start but not load with massive errors on log, on OSX 10.7 it even dont generate a setting.cfg (ok, thats my office maschine)

on Win 7-64 same/similar like Linux) I'll stay at my 1.05 game (docking with 1 fps to my 1500 parts EPL and science minmus station).

One docking maneuver = 6 (?) hours...

Frustrating... i think never before a new version was that "unsteady/unready".

Edited April 21, 2016 by Jansn67

[MOD - @Jansn67, I've split your post into its own topic - please don't hijack other people's discussions]

As per the support stickies, please provide your log files, your system specification, your mod list and reproduction steps for the issue.

Based on one of your old edits to your OP, it sounds like you were trying to load an old savegame using over 200+ mods. Bear in mind that since KSP 1.1 involved a transition to the new Unity 5.2 engine, many mods are likely to not have been updated yet.

You should carefully test your installation by adding one mod at a time, starting with, say, ModuleManager.
